name: Color Boom (Deepak Nelson)
description:
Hello, I'm Deepak Nelson, Participating in 3D App Jam-Programmer Track

Mix color Cubes and fuse them to there secondary colors to end up black.

Color Boom is a puzzle game where you match different colors to get appropriate secondary colors.

The Goal is to get all 8 cubes Black.

Hoping my project meets the requirements.

Thank you.

GitHub :- https://github.com/TheDraKun/TCSJam
